comment: I had Dr. Roper 20 years ago.  One of the best teachers I had ever had.  He inspired me to be my best.  Outstanding in presenting info.  Cares about his students.  If you want to be inspired, take this man while you can!!!
He is a great teacher and is willing to help you if you need it. The information is straight forward. Take him before he is gone.

My fav class so far at KSU.  PHENOMENAL professor--great lectures, very accomodating, very accessible.  Provides make-up test days, gives opps for extra credit.  Study and you'll get an A.  HIGHLY RECOMMEND!

Excellent teacher, can't say enough good things about him.  He really cares, his lectures are interesting.  You dont HAVE to come to class but it adds points to your grade if you do.  If you miss a test, you can make it up.

Excellent professor, reviews before test. Classes are interesting. Gives you a chance for extra credit. Very knowledgeable and is willing to help if you have questions. I would definately recommend taking his class. Never tests on anything he doesn't go over in class. No need to buy text book.
great teacher.  have to come to class.  have an a and don't miss a day you don't have to take final.  gives makeup days for each exam. super nice and funny!
Good teacher. You need to come to class to excell though. (which is the sign of a good teacher in my mind)

Don't buy the book.  Tests are from notes only.  Easy to follow.  Not Difficult.  4 exams are your grades. . . not cummulative.  He gives you hints on what will be on the test.  Good Sense of Humor.  "A" if you come to class & study your notes.
Roper's contribution to 6200 is limited, but his one lecture is content packed.  He is easy to listen to.  Would take him again.
Informative class.  Not difficult, but very helpful stuff to know.  Little guy is pretty amusing too.
